column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: An attempt to remove a collapsed crane from an 11-storey building In Village 2
column7: 2019.------The collapse  occurred around 11:20 am on November 16.------Part of the crane was removed
column8: leaving only the top section stuck on the building. This poses no danger to people.------Authorities decided to suspend the construction on the site completely
column10: evacuated workers and advised people living nearby on the situation. ------A working group is now discussing how best to remove the rest of the crane safely. ------KBN
